longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of an original Birth Certificate accompanied by an
  official photo ID (e.g. driver's licence), issued to
  nationals of Guam. 

Visa required.

Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward ticket could be refused
  entry. 



 Virgin Isl
